trans-unit.source: You must agree with our Terms of Service
trans-unit.target: 您必須同意我們的條款
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to create a new MEGA account without accept previously the 'Terms of Service'.

trans-unit.source: Failed to confirm account. Please try again. [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.
Title of the dialog displayed when the confirmation of a MEGA account failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your account has been created, confirmed and activated. You will be logged in automatically.
trans-unit.target: 您的帳戶已創建，確認並啟用了。您將自動登入。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully.
Title of the dialog displayed when confirm a MEGA account succesfully - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Check your e-mail and click the link to login and confirm your account

trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account.
Title of the dialog displayed when a user create a new MEGA account successfully, informing that will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm account - (String as short as possible).

Preserve the {0} and ({1}) codes because is for include the maximum reliable download number and the precise number of nodes to be downloaded in runtime.

trans-unit.source: PIN lock codes do not match
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when a user are trying to create or change a PIN lock code and the introduced codes don't match. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed, you will exceed the storage limit of your account. Do you want to upgrade your account?

Title of the dialog displayed when a user makes and operation that exceeds the storage space limits of the account (overquota error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: You have not selected a default download location for your files.To proceed with the download, please select a destination folder or go to settings in order to set up your default download location.

trans-unit.source: You do not have permission to copy this file type to the destination folder. Are you trying to save/copy a file of an unsupported type to an SD card? Please try to save/copy the file to your device's internal memory instead.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有將此檔案類型複製到目標資料夾的權限。您是否要將不支援的檔案類型儲存/ 複製到SD卡中？也請嘗試將檔案儲存/ 複製到您的設備內部記憶體中，以作為替代方案。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to copy a file failed because the app or the user don't have write permission to copy into the destination (i.e. copy into a SD card an unsupported file type).

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all the required fields and try again.

trans-unit.source: The credit card number, month/year of expiration and the CVV should be numeric. Please check that everything is correct and try again.

trans-unit.source: You are about to cancel your MEGA subscription. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to help change your mind.

trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription, asking him send a feedback message.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your feedback! Are you sure you want to cancel your MEGA subscription?
trans-unit.target: 感謝您的建議！您確定要取消您的MEGA訂購嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription. This sentence is for give thanks to the user for the feedback sent during the cancellation process and asking for confirmation to do it.

Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription failed - (String as short as possible).

Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to cancel a subscription finished successfully - (String as short as possible).
Title of the dialogs displayed when a user is trying to cancel a subscription - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Please give us your feedback. Thanks.

Descripton of the task that automatic uploads photos tot MEGA. Seen in the background services Settings screen

trans-unit.source: Your account has been updated. Do you want to check the new account details?

Title of the dialog displayed when the account is updated (upgraded or downgraded).

trans-unit.source: Our SSL/TLS certificate can't be verified. You could be affected by a man-in-the-middle attack.

trans-unit.target: 清空垃圾桶失敗，請再試一次。

trans-unit.target: 您確定要永久刪除所有垃圾桶中的文件？

trans-unit.source: You are trying to add your own email as a contact.
trans-unit.target: 邀請失敗，您正在將自己加入聯絡人表單。

trans-unit.source: Failed to remove link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 移除連結失敗，請再試一次。

trans-unit.source: You cannot perform this action. Please connect to the Internet and try again.
trans-unit.target: 您不能執行此操作。請於連接網路後，再試一次。

trans-unit.source: You don't have access to the folder '{0}'. Please select another one and try again.
trans-unit.target: 您無法存取路徑 '{0}' 。請選擇其他路徑並再試一次。

trans-unit.source: If you agree, the current account will be logged out and all Offline data will be erased. Do you want to continue?

trans-unit.source: To access this folder/file, you will need its Decryption key. If you do not have the key, contact the creator of the link.
trans-unit.target: 要進入此資料夾/檔案，您需要它的解密密鑰。如果沒有密鑰，請聯絡此連結的創建者。

Alert title shown when you tap on a encrypted file/folder link that can't be opened because it doesn't include the key to see its contents - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The file has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The file has been deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 檔案連結不存在之可能原因： - 因ToS / AUP違規，故該檔案連結已被刪除。 - 無效的網址 – 您嘗試存取的連結並不存在。 - 該使用者已將檔案連結刪除。
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when you open a file link and it's no longer available. It explains the reasons that could be causing it. Keep "\n"

trans-unit.source: This could be due to the following reasons: - The folder link has been removed because of a ToS/AUP violation. - Invalid URL – the link you are trying to access does not exist. - The folder link has been deleted by the user.

trans-unit.note: Error message shown when a folder link doesn't exist. Keep "\n"
Error title shown when you open a file or folder link and it's no longer available - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your purchase of a MEGA subscription has not passed validation at our licence server. On restart of this app we will retry to validate your subscription licences. Please contact MEGA support if the error continues.
trans-unit.target: 您的MEGA訂閱購買未於我們的授權伺服器上通過驗證。重新開啟此應用程式後，我們將試著再次驗證您的購買憑證。如果此錯誤仍然存在，請聯絡MEGA支援中心。

trans-unit.source: Could not import the folder link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法匯入該資料夾連結，請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder link.

trans-unit.source: This e-mail address has already registered an account with MEGA.
trans-unit.target: 這個電子郵件信箱在MEGA已被註冊。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the users tries to create an account with an email already in use.

trans-unit.source: The account confirmation link that you are using is incomplete. Please check the link length and be sure that you have copied the entire link then try again.
trans-unit.target: 您所使用的帳戶啟用確認連結並不完整。請檢查該連結之長度，確保已複製了整個連結，然後再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account but the confirm link is incomplete because it has less characters than it should (probably because the user hasn't copied and pasted the entire link).

trans-unit.source: The link you are using for a new signup is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 您使用的新註冊連結為無效的。
trans-unit.note: Message of the warning dialog shown when the user tries to make a new sign up using an invalid link (#newsignup).

trans-unit.source: Your account was terminated due to a breach of MEGA's Terms of Service, such as abuse of rights of others; sharing and/or importing illegal data; or system abuse.
trans-unit.target: 您的帳戶因違反MEGA的服務條款而被終止，例如：侵犯他人權益、分享和/或匯入非法資料，或濫用系統資源。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

trans-unit.source: Your account has not been confirmed yet.
trans-unit.target: 您的帳戶尚未確認啟用。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has not been confirmed yet.

trans-unit.source: You have attempted to log in too many times. Please wait until {0} and try again.
trans-unit.target: 您於短時間內嘗試登入的次數過多。請等待至 {0} 後再重試。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and has made several failed attempts. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the exact time until the user has to wait.
Title of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

trans-unit.source: Failed to share item(s) from MEGA. The destination application seems busy. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: 無法從MEGA共享檔案。目標應用程式似乎很忙。請稍後再試。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails because the destination app is busy.

trans-unit.source: Failed to retrieve node details. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得節點詳情。 請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get node details failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get node details failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: There is an unknown error in the download path. Please try again and if it continues to fail, please contact support@mega.nz. [{0}]
trans-unit.target: 下載路徑中出現未知的錯誤。請重試，如果仍失敗，請聯繫support@mega.nz。 [{0}]
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because an unknown error in the download path. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

trans-unit.source: The file/folder of the link that you are trying to open was not found. You are probably logged in to a different account. Please, log in to the correct account and try again.
trans-unit.target: 找不到您嘗試開啟的檔案 / 資料夾。 您可能已登入另一個帳戶。請登入正確的帳戶，然後再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in.

trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案 / 資料夾
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Your queued transfer exceeds the current transfer quota available for your account and may therefore be interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 您排程中的傳輸量已超過您帳戶目前可用的傳輸配額，因此傳輸可能會中斷。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user exceeds the transfer quota limits of the account (transfer overquota error).
Message of the dialog displayed when a user exceeds the transfer quota limits of the account (transfer overquota error) - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel all the pending downloads?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要取消所有待處理的下載檔案嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user wants to cancel all the pending downloads.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel all the pending uploads?
trans-unit.target: 您確定要取消所有待處理的上傳檔案嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when a user wants to cancel all the pending uploads.

trans-unit.source: Failed to view the contact details. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: 無法查看聯絡資料。請稍後再試。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to view a contact details failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to view a contact details failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to show the upload options. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: 無法顯示上傳選項。請稍後再試。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to show the upload options failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to show the upload options failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the log file in an external location to use it later?
trans-unit.target: 要將日誌檔案儲存於外部位置以便稍後使用嗎？
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed to ask the user if wants to save the generated log file in an external location of the app.
Title of the dialog displayed to ask the user if wants to save the generated log file in an external location of the app - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to share the file/folder link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法分享檔案 / 資料夾連結。請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to share a file/folder link.
Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to share a file/folder link.

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the internal file/folder of the link. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法打開該連結的內部檔案/ 資料夾。請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fail trying to open a link of an internal node.

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the internal file/folder
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟內部檔案/ 資料夾。
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog displayed when fail trying to open a link of an internal node - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Failed to clear cache. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 清除快取失敗，請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to clear cache failed.
Title of the dialog displayed when the process to clear cache failed - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: Error preparing downloads. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 準備下載時發生錯誤。請再試一次。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to prepare files or folders for download failed.

trans-unit.source: Your account has been suspended due to multiple breaches of MEGA's Terms of Service. Please check your email inbox.
trans-unit.target: 由於多次違反MEGA的服務條款，您的帳戶已被暫停使用。請至您的電子信箱收信以了解詳情。
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked for multiple copyright violation.

trans-unit.source: Fill the required fields and try again.
trans-unit.target: Fill the required fields and try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when required fields are empty.
Title of the dialog displayed when the user has failed to change his password - (String as short as possible).
Message of the dialog displayed when the user has chosen a very weak password.

trans-unit.source: Incorrect email format. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Incorrect email format. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user types an email address with an incorrect format.

trans-unit.source: Failed to change your password. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to change your password. Please try again.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the user has failed to change his password
Title of the dialog displayed when the change password process finish successful.

trans-unit.source: We have sent you an email confirming your password change.
trans-unit.target: We have sent you an email confirming your password change.
trans-unit.note: Message of the dialog displayed when the change password process finish successful.
